Name: The Lost Battalion: All Out Warfare
About the game: A Simple Side-Scrolling Shooter set in the Western Fronts of World War 1. Choose one of three heroes and customize your Battlecard loadout. Featuring Arcade, a score chaser that consists of eight different levels. See you on the front!
